name: Cicin's Cold Glare
description: After your Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: If Cryo Cicins's Usage(s) stacks have surpassed their upper limit, deal 2 Cryo DMG.
descriptionraw: After your $[A2101], who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: If <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C121011]</color>'s $[K3] stacks have surpassed their upper limit, deal 2 $[K101].
descriptionreplaced: After your Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Cicins</color>'s <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color> stacks have surpassed their upper limit, deal 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>.
